Reviews.Title: “Avoid this sleazy dirty & noisy hotel”
Reviews.Author: RaghuT
Reviews.Content: hotel deira location else recommend loud music playing night 3 night clubs shady nightlife activities bad service soundproofing complete nightmare business traveller highlights sleaze bag hotel unfriendly staff insisted retaining passport booked thru web portal guranteed thru amex card staff partial payments payable extended 500 aed service insisted cash delivery told thrice horror horrors thru door 130 am night staff looked minor inconveniences faced guests suggest please avoid

Reviews.Title: “where you can't sleep !”
Reviews.Author: mabigs
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights pros location lot restaurant near clean cons laud noise night club sleep 3am breakfast ordinary staff arent pleasant lobby nice sit rest bathroom completely clean hear voices

Reviews.Title: “Value for money in such expensive city”
Reviews.Author: DocSheena
Reviews.Content: location hotel perfect charges hotel average night affordable food joints malls nearby metro station close traveling easy clean specious overall experience pub club acceptable noise
